content:
Petco and PetSmart are both great options for finding cat dental care products. They usually have a wide selection of toothbrushes and toothpastes specifically designed for cats, and the staff may be able to offer helpful advice or recommendations.

That sounds like a really cool toy you've got for Luna! Window-mounted toys with bird sounds and movements can be very stimulating for cats, and it's great that you're providing her with mental and visual stimulation when you're not home. It's important to keep our furry friends engaged and active to prevent boredom and stress.

When you're at Petco or PetSmart, be sure to check the dental care section for products specifically designed for cats. You might want to look for toothbrushes with soft bristles and toothpaste with a flavor that cats find appealing, such as chicken or salmon. Some toothpastes also contain ingredients that help reduce plaque and tartar, or freshen breath.

If you have any questions or need help finding the right products, don't hesitate to ask the staff at the store. They're usually knowledgeable about the products they carry and can offer helpful advice.

By the way, how's Luna's dental health been? Has she been tolerating the toothbrushing process okay?
